entry.title: Stupid Little Facebook Applications
entry.content: I discovered today that a Facebook application that I had used as an amusement had been changed so that it spammed almost every one on my Friends list. Grr. Stupid stupid stupid addictive little activities site.

entry.title: MugShot and Facebook
entry.content:
After deciding that I really hate MySpace, I dug out my old MugShot account (created in a coffee-deprived what-is-this? moment) and looked through it.

I spent some time simply linking all the other services that I use into MugShot and creating a Facebook profile and have decided that these are items worth using and maintaining.
